About

Hi! My name is Tiffany, and I'm a junior web designer and front-end web developer with a background in e-commerce and graphic design. I'm a recent graduate of the Front-End Web Developer program at BCIT with hands-on experience in designing and developing responsive websites and applications. I have a passion for creating visually appealing designs, writing clean code, and a fervent desire to learn.
